Posts.Content: I do the crying thing - didn't realize tamoxifen did that. Thought I was just depressed. I'm slowly losing weight, I was on the South Beach Diet last year before being diagnosed and surgery and chemo and rad- anyways i was losing really fast - now i'm losing really slow - thought it might be because of the poisons in my or being put into menopause. I walk and do the wii fit
Posts.Title: am I destined to be fat while on tamoxifen?
